Title: We Don't Work Together Anymore
Writer: Michael Brandt (developed by), Derek Haas (developed by), Dick Wolf (created by), Matt Olmstead (created by), Mike Batistick, Mo Masi, Cole Maliska (story editor)
Actors: Jason Beghe, Jon Seda, Sophia Bush, Jesse Lee Soffer
Plot: Lindsay calls on Voight and his unit for help with her first case on the federal task force; Burgess is relegated to desk duty.
